Units / Codings: 1: In situ < 100 m,2: In situ > 100 m,3: In situ PI,4: In situ PI not possible,5: Out of national territory,6: Out of EU28,7: In Office PI,-1: Not Relevant
0: completely different LC classes,1: LC classes with similar surface cover but in different nomenclature context (e.g. LUCAS shrubland vs. OSM transitional woodland),2:the same LC classes
